title: MIMO Analysis
description: This project focused on analyzing the directional properties and conditioning of Multiple-Input Multiple-Output (MIMO) systems using Singular Value Decomposition (SVD). Additionally, an H-infinity controller was designed to robustly stabilize the system while accounting for structured and unstructured uncertainties.

details.challenge: Assessing the conditioning of MIMO systems and designing a robust controller capable of maintaining stability despite uncertainties.
details.solution: Used Singular Value Decomposition to analyze system properties and designed an H-infinity controller to ensure robust stabilization under model uncertainties.
